meta.name: Sync Notion Content to Webflow CMS as Draft Items with Status Tracking

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "isArchived": false,
  "isDraft": true,
  "fieldData": {
    "name": {{ JSON.stringify($('Merge Content').first().json.mergedContent.fieldData.name) }},
    "slug": "{{ $json.items.filter(item => item.fieldData.name == $('Merge Content').item.json.name).first().fieldData.slug }}",

    "category-h1-title": {{ JSON.stringify($('Merge Content').first().json.mergedContent.fieldData['category-h1-title']) }},
